title: Симоньян объяснила санкции Минфина США против нее
cleaned_sentences: The editor -in -chief of the Russia Today (RT) TV channel Margarita Simonyan explained why the US Ministry of Finance imposed sanctions against it.
The corresponding publication appeared in her Telegram channel.
“All Western media outlets have come in a fit of paranoia.

The US Ministry of Justice claims that RT has hired one of the largest conservative bloggers with a multimillion -dollar audience in the United States in order to interfere in the elections and spread Russian narratives.
Therefore, my colleagues and my five colleagues also slapped sanctions, ”said the head of RT.
She also urged readers to imagine what would happen if these statements were true.
Earlier, Simonyan reacted to the introduction of sanctions against her.
On September 4, it became known that the US Department of Finance imposed sanctions against Simonyan and its deputies.

According to the Ministry of Finance, Russian journalists allegedly use artificial intelligence and dipkeies technologies to influence the American elections, namely, to undermine the trust in US election institutions.
RT leaders were also suspected of recruiting large American bloggers.
